metadata.title: Coccolithophorids in the Eastern Bering Sea Phytoplankton: Before and During Anomalous 1997 Bloom

creators.name: Russian Academy of Science, P.P. Shirshov Institute of Oceanology

metadata.description: Unusual conditions occurred in the eastern Bering Sea in spring - summer 1997.  Ice retreating was very rapid, numbers of storms were reduced, amount of cloud free days were extraordinary high, upper mixed layer was anomalously shallow, sea surface temperature in summer was > 4Â°C above normal  and water column stratification was extremely sharp.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To show coccolithophorids in the Eastern Bering Sea Phytoplankton: Before and During anomalous 1997 Bloom
